content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today? Are you looking for help with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services?
Yeah, I need a plumber. My kitchen sink is leaking. How much is this going to cost?
Thank you for sharing that. I can help get this scheduled! May I have your name, please?
This is Mike. So what’s the estimate?

Thank you, Mike. For a leaking kitchen sink, the price can vary depending on the exact issue. Typically, our visits start at $89, which covers the diagnosis and minor fixes—larger repairs or replacement parts may be extra. Can you share your address so I can confirm we can send someone to your area?
I’m at 211 Willow Lane. And $89 just to show up? That’s higher than I thought.

Thank you for your address, Mike. The $89 fee covers the visit and diagnosis, and in many cases, it also covers minor repairs. We’ll provide a full estimate before any work beyond that. May I get a good day and time for your appointment?
What do you have available tomorrow morning?
Let me check our availability for tomorrow morning. One moment please.
We have an opening at 9 AM tomorrow. Would that work for you?
Great! You are scheduled for 9 AM tomorrow for plumbing service at 211 Willow Lane. We’ll send a reminder before the appointment. Please let us know if you have any questions.
